entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Haro Strait late this morning and early this afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
